body:
Heey resepignev here,

Maybe some of you are active on plug.dj and noticed there will be a big great update.
This Update has sooooooo much stuff in it, you can't believe it!
Here is a short video by the plug.dj staff: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VtrFwflxjWA

Stay excited!
